BUCKS COUNTY ROAD MAINTENANCE

  • About Us

Bucks County Road Maintenance Department is located in Doylestown, PA. It is responsible for maintaining and repairing over 400 bridges, and 3,500 miles of roads and highways throughout the Bucks County in Pennsylvania. If you need to report a local road damage, please visit the 'Report Damage' page, or call at (215)123-4567 Ext. 2.

Contact Us

  • 1234 Random Rd
  • Doylestown, PA 18901
  • Phone: (215)123-4567
  • E-mail: BCRM@buckscounty.org
